Adrenaline Junkie.card_desc: [SMGS] Dealing damage with Submachine Guns restores Energy.

Blood Reaper.card_desc: [Cyclone Strike] Cyclone Strike now deals 115% of target's health as damage over its duration, and Koga moves 15% faster during the attack.

Criminal Record.card_desc: [Dragon Stance] Gain {scale=5|5}% lifesteal while in Dragon Stance.

Dragon Fangs.card_desc: [Dragon Stance] Dragon Stance no longer consumes Energy, and instead consumes 200 Health per second. Requires at least 300 Health to initiate.

Memento.card_desc: [Armor] Killing an enemy grants {scale=2|2}% ultimate charge.

Raw Talent.card_desc: [Agility] Increase the speed boost of Agility by {scale=4|4}%

Surprise!.card_desc: [Shadow Step] Activating Shadow Step generates {scale=6|6} Ammo.

Swift Hands.card_desc: [Dragon Stance] Reduce the time to enter and exit Dragon Stance by {scale=10|10}%

Tenacious.card_desc: [Shadow Step] Activating Shadow Step heals you for {scale=60|60}

Trained Killer.card_desc: [Dragon Stance] While in Dragon Stance generate {scale=6|6} Ammo per second.

Trespasser.card_desc: [Agility] Gain {scale=20|20}% increased jump height while Agility is active.

Trigger Happy.card_desc: [Weapon] While firing SMGs increase healing received by {scale=10|10}%

Unyielding.card_desc: [Dragon Stance] Reduce energy consumption by {scale=6|6}% while in Dragon Stance

Wanted.card_desc: [Agility] Gain {scale=4|4} Ammo per second while Agility is active.

Wind's Embrace.card_desc: [Agility] Heal {scale=20|20} Health per second while Agility is active.
